> Rule: "disappears after N turns", and "countdown decreases every turn (including current)".
> 
> So if at turn t, life span N, then at turn t, countdown is N, at turn t+1, countdown N-1, ..., at turn t+N-1, countdown 1, and at turn t+N, it disappears, so it's not present at turn t+N.
> 
> Therefore, food is present from turn t to turn t + N - 1 inclusive.
